# README
## About
This theme emulates the dark color scheme of KDE Plasma Breeze Dark Theme. 

## Install

     Linux Ctrl+P
     macOS Shift+âŒ˜+P
     Windows Ctrl+P
Paste the following and hit **enter**
    
    ext install Breeze-Dark-Theme
## Activate Theme

    File>Preferences>Themes
    Select Breeze Dark Theme for VS Code
